sztejkat.abstractfmt.util

Class CCharExchangeBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sztejkat.abstractfmt.util.CCharExchangeBuffer

  • public final class CCharExchangeBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    A simplified toolbox class which is intended to be used for testing purpose of character based formats and provides an ability to write and read characters from a certain buffer.

    Notes: This class could be a pair PipedReader and PipedWriter if those could be tuned to have a different behavior on circular buffer overrun. The primary intent of those pipes was to provide a blocking I/O to exchange data between threads. In this package and for testing I need a different approach.

    Thread safety

    This class is NOT thread safe and is intended to be used in single thread to buffer and read characters, possibly interleaving those operations.

      Where to read next character

      • GROWTH_INCREMENT

        private static final int GROWTH_INCREMENT
        How much of size will be added to buffer when it is necessary
        See Also:

      • MOVE_TRIGGER

        private static final int MOVE_TRIGGER
        How much of data needs to be read from buffer to move data to beginning of it.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SHRINK_TRIGGER

        private static final int SHRINK_TRIGGER
        How much of data must be free in buffer after move trigger to shrink it. The shrunken size will be current size + GROWTH_INCREMENT so this value must be larger than GROWTH_INCREMENT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
